content.query:
CREATE TABLE [wwi_staging].DailySalesCounts
    (
        [Date] [int]  NOT NULL,
        [NorthAmerica] [int]  NOT NULL,
        [SouthAmerica] [int]  NOT NULL,
        [Europe] [int]  NOT NULL,
        [Africa] [int]  NOT NULL,
        [Asia] [int]  NOT NULL
    )
GO

-- Replace <PrimaryStorage> with the workspace default storage account name.
COPY INTO wwi_staging.DailySalesCounts
FROM 'https://asadatalakedp210504.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi-02/campaign-analytics/dailycounts.txt'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
    FIELDTERMINATOR='.',
    ROWTERMINATOR=','
)
GO

SELECT * FROM [wwi_staging].DailySalesCounts
ORDER BY [Date] DESC
GO
